head.intro: Hi, I'm Shashank, Software and Physics Enthusiast. I'm working both as a freelancer and full time in the software industry.
head.about: I have a degree in Physics (B. Sc. Physics Hons.) from IGNOU, and started working in Software Development industry since I graduated from high school. I've started with basic wordpress websites üñ•Ô∏è, and made my way to ReactJs in 2017. I started learning web development full fledged in 2016, starting with HTML, CSS and JS, slowly progressing up to JS frameworks and libraries.

skills.heading: All of the mentioned skills and os are accumulated over time, learned and mastered on my own. I had no prior knowledge in any of the mentioned technologies, which makes me a Self Taught Programmer
skills.base: I'm proficient in the mentioned operating systems, and I've all of them available with me anytime.
